title: A two-stage approval process as specified in Regulation No
clause_text: A two-stage approval process as specified in Regulation No.2.6.1 will be followed for such proposals, wherever necessary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
